body_html: @niklas88 GPU at low utilization while TF only uses 1 core is consistent with copy problem. memcpy of 1GB array would take 1 second and will use a single core. You could check if align_numpy_tf is working for you by feeding 1GB aligned array and checking if takes 1 sec vs 1ms
body_text: @niklas88 GPU at low utilization while TF only uses 1 core is consistent with copy problem. memcpy of 1GB array would take 1 second and will use a single core. You could check if align_numpy_tf is working for you by feeding 1GB aligned array and checking if takes 1 sec vs 1ms
body: @niklas88 GPU at low utilization while TF only uses 1 core is consistent with copy problem. memcpy of 1GB array would take 1 second and will use a single core. You could check if `align_numpy_tf` is working for you by feeding 1GB aligned array and checking if takes 1 sec vs 1ms
